  • Constructor Details

    • Paladin

      public Paladin​(java.lang.String name, int hp, int power, int initiative, int shield, int mana)
      user's constructor of Paladin
      Parameters:
      name - String : Paladin's name
      hp - int : Paladin's hp, when they pass trough 0, the character die
      power - int : Paladin's power, representing the damage done by the character
      initiative - int : Paladin's initiative, determinate which character attack in first place
      shield - int : Paladin's shield, that reduce damage received by the chosen value
      mana - int : Paladin's mana, more he have, more he could use heal
